serverInfo.name: SlackMCP
serverInfo.description: MCP server for Slack - read/write messages, list channels, search, summarize, extract action items

tools.name: get_channel_messages
tools.description: Fetch the last messages from a Slack channel by name or ID

tools.name: list_channels
tools.description: List all channels the bot has access to

tools.name: post_message
tools.description: Post a message to a Slack channel

message.description: The text message to post to the channel

tools.name: get_threads
tools.description: Fetch the threads from a Slack channel by name or ID

tools.name: reply_to_thread
tools.description: Reply to a thread in a Slack channel

thread_ts.description: The thread timestamp to reply to

message.description: The text message to post as a reply

tools.name: search_messages
tools.description: Search messages across Slack channels by text query

tools.name: summarize_channel
tools.description: Summarize recent messages from a Slack channel using LLM sampling

channel.description: Slack channel name (without #) or channel ID

limit.description: Number of recent messages to include in the summary (default 50)

tools.name: extract_action_items
tools.description: Extract actionable items from a Slack channel

prompts.name: daily_channel_summary
prompts.description: Generate a daily summary of a Slack channel

prompts.name: action_items_summary
prompts.description: Extract actionable items from a Slack channel or thread

prompts.name: thread_followup
prompts.description: Summarize a Slack thread and optionally generate a reply
